title: African leaders tell Putin war ‘must end’ during Ukraine peace talks
description: A group of leaders from seven African countries met with Russian President Vladimir Putin to discuss their Ukraine peace plan, a day after meeting with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in Kyiv.

title: Dozens killed in rebel attack on school in Uganda
description: The Ugandan military said the Allied Democratic Forces, a group with ties to the Islamic State, is responsible for an attack on the Lhubirira Secondary School in western Uganda. Dozens have been killed and at least six people have been abducted.

title: Better ties with the U.S. may be about one thing: China's struggling economy
Children among at least 17 killed by airstrike in Sudan's capital, officials say
description: An airstrike in Sudan’s capital Khartoum on Saturday killed at least 17 people, including five children, health officials said, as fighting continued between rival generals seeking to control the country.

title: Britain’s King Charles rides on horseback at first ‘Trooping the Colour’ parade
description: Britain’s King Charles celebrated his first official birthday parade as sovereign on Saturday, riding on horseback to inspect soldiers in a ceremony that has been an annual event since 1760.

title: At least 25 killed in attack on school in Uganda
description: Ugandan police say at least 25 people have been killed in a suspected rebel attack on a school near the Congo border.
